questions: Statue of Liberty's color change: Jasmeet says physical change, Kaif says chemical change. Which is correct?
option3: Both Jasmeet and Kaif are correct

questions: Which of the following is NOT TRUE about the forests?
option2: Provides food, shelter and clothing materials
option4: Provides shelter to wildlife which can be dangerous for humans

questions: Bobo and his teacher went to a forest. Teacher said not to make any noise. Why?
option3: Noise could disturb both birds and animals

questions: Forests don't flood. What is the main reason for it?
option1: Forests act as natural absorber and allow rainwater to seep in
option2: There is a good network of pipes to allow rainwater flow out of forests
option3: Forests channel the water such that most of the rainwater reaches cities
option4: Most of the rain water is absorbed by the leaves for photosynthesis

questions: Which of the following factors help in preventing soil erosion in the forests?
option1: Leaves of trees allow water to drip slowly on ground
option2: Roots of trees bind the soil together
option3: Spongy ground prevents water flood and hence prevents soil erosion

questions: The upper boundary of the saturated soil layer, where gaps between particles and rocks are filled with water, is referred to as ?

What information can be obtained from the rainfall map?
option1: Amount of rainfall in different places
option2: Kind of water management needed in different places
option3: Places which are prone to floods and droughts

questions: Bobo poured 50 mL of water into a soil sample; 20 mL of water drained out. How much water was retained in the soil?
